com.ibm.opencard.handler
Class Request

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--com.ibm.opencard.handler.Request
public class Request
extends java.lang.Object

Objects of this class are used for communication between agents agency and handlers. When a Request is constructed, an ID, an argument buffer and a parameter buffer are assigned. The ID may changed during the lifetime of a request object. The buffers are supposed to be filled and cleared if required.

See Also:
Buffer
